channel.description: Recent content in objects on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-09
item.description: Apple announces a way to buy stuff by tapping iPhones together (2 minute read) Apple is releasing a new Tap to Pay feature for the iPhone that allows people to receive payments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-15
item.description: Zoom is releasing a new tool to let paid users charge for admission to online events like conferences or fitness classes (3 minute read) OnZoom is Zoom’s new online event hosting platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-31
item.description: Huawei tops Samsung as worldâ€™s No. 1 smartphone company for first time (2 minute read) Huawei has surpassed Samsung as the world’s number one supplier of smartphones.
